      • cancel

        public final void cancel()
        Instructs the scanner to terminate scanning as soon as possible. This method returns immediately.

      • cancelImpl

        protected void cancelImpl()
        Subclasses may override this method to perform any additional activities that are required for cancelling the scan.

        IMPORTANT: This method should not block.

      • reset

        public abstract void reset()
        Instructs the scanner to reset any state or cache information prior to initiating a scan.
